page.title: 01SCHOOL BAND CONCERT
page.content: AT THE BAND CONCERT IT STARTED VERY QUIETLY UNTIL THE HEADMASTER STARTED TO SPEAK.HE SAID HELLO AND THE USUAL THINGS. HE THEN INTRODUCED THE FIRST PIECE, THE BAND STARTED TO PLAY "LET IT BE" THEN THE THEME FROM "DYNASTY" AND FINALLY THE THEME FROM "THE A TEAM".THERE WAS LOTS OF MUSIC PLAYED OR SUNG BY MANY DIFFERENT GROUPS OF PEOPLE SUCH AS THE BAND, THE JUNIOR BAND,TWO DIFFERENT CHOIRS, A THIRD YEAR CLASS EFFORT, SOLOS AND A MUSICAL PLAY WHICH WAS VERY FUNNY.ONE OF THE HIGHLIGHTS OF THE EVENING WAS WHEN THE JUNIOR BAND WENT WRONG AND EVERYONE LAUGHED. WE CARRIED ON.
